methods.awaitUpdate:
Wait for updates to this DynamicTable.
 
 In some implementations, this call may also terminate in case of interrupt or spurious wakeup (see
 java.util.concurrent.locks.Condition#await()).

*Overload 1*  
  
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param timeout: (long) - The maximum time to wait in milliseconds.
  :return: (boolean) false if the timeout elapses without notification, true otherwise.
methods.isFailed: :return: (boolean) true if this table is in a failure state.
methods.listenForDirectUpdates:
Subscribe for updates to this table. Direct listeners are invoked immediately when changes are published, rather
 than via a LiveTableMonitor notification queue.

:param listener: (io.deephaven.db.v2.Listener) - listener for updates
methods.listenForUpdates:
**Incompatible overloads text - text from the first overload:**

Subscribe for updates to this table. After the optional initial image, listener will be invoked via the
 LiveTableMonitor notification queue associated with this DynamicTable.

*Overload 1*  
  :param listener: (io.deephaven.db.v2.Listener) - listener for updates
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param listener: (io.deephaven.db.v2.Listener) - listener for updates
  :param replayInitialImage: (boolean) - true to process updates for all initial rows in the table plus all new row changes;
          false to only process new row changes
  
*Overload 3*  
  :param listener: (io.deephaven.db.v2.ShiftAwareListener) - listener for updates
methods.newModifiedColumnSet:
Retrieve the ModifiedColumnSet that will be used when propagating updates from this table.

:param columnNames: (java.lang.String...) - the columns that should belong to the resulting set.
:return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.ModifiedColumnSet) the resulting ModifiedColumnSet for the given columnNames
methods.newModifiedColumnSetIdentityTransformer:
**Incompatible overloads text - text from the first overload:**

Create a transformer that uses an identity mapping from one ColumnSourceMap to another. The two CSMs must have
 equivalent column names and column ordering.

*Overload 1*  
  :param newColumns: (java.util.Map<java.lang.String,io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.ColumnSource<?>>) - the column source map for result table
  :return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.ModifiedColumnSet.Transformer) a simple Transformer that makes a cheap, but CSM compatible copy
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param other: (io.deephaven.db.v2.DynamicTable) - the result table
  :return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.ModifiedColumnSet.Transformer) a simple Transformer that makes a cheap, but CSM compatible copy
methods.newModifiedColumnSetTransformer:
**Incompatible overloads text - text from the first overload:**

Create a ModifiedColumnSet.Transformer that can be used to propagate dirty columns from this table to
 listeners of the provided resultTable.

*Overload 1*  
  :param columnNames: (java.lang.String[]) - the source columns
  :param columnSets: (io.deephaven.db.v2.ModifiedColumnSet[]) - the destination columns in the convenient ModifiedColumnSet form
  :return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.ModifiedColumnSet.Transformer) a transformer that knows the dirty details
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param resultTable: (io.deephaven.db.v2.DynamicTable) - the destination table
  :param columnNames: (java.lang.String...) - the columns that map one-to-one with the result table
  :return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.ModifiedColumnSet.Transformer) a transformer that passes dirty details via an identity mapping
  
*Overload 3*  
  :param resultTable: (io.deephaven.db.v2.DynamicTable) - the destination table
  :param matchPairs: (io.deephaven.db.tables.select.MatchPair...) - the columns that map one-to-one with the result table
  :return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.ModifiedColumnSet.Transformer) a transformer that passes dirty details via an identity mapping
methods.notifyListeners:
Initiate update delivery to this table's listeners. Will notify direct listeners before completing, and enqueue
 notifications for all other listeners.

*Overload 1*  
  :param added: (io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.Index) - index values added to the table
  :param removed: (io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.Index) - index values removed from the table
  :param modified: (io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.Index) - index values modified in the table.
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param update: (io.deephaven.db.v2.ShiftAwareListener.Update) - the set of table changes to propagate The caller gives this update object away; the invocation of
          notifyListeners takes ownership, and will call release on it once it is not used anymore;
          callers should pass a clone for updates they intend to further use.
methods.notifyListenersOnError:
Initiate failure delivery to this table's listeners. Will notify direct listeners before completing, and enqueue
 notifications for all other listeners.

:param e: (java.lang.Throwable) - error
:param sourceEntry: (io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.UpdatePerformanceTracker.Entry) - performance tracking
methods.removeDirectUpdateListener:
Unsubscribe the supplied listener.

:param listener: (io.deephaven.db.v2.Listener) - listener for updates
methods.removeUpdateListener:
Unsubscribe the supplied listener.

*Overload 1*  
  :param listener: (io.deephaven.db.v2.Listener) - listener for updates
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param listener: (io.deephaven.db.v2.ShiftAwareListener) - listener for updates

text:
A dynamically changing table.

 The DynamicTable interface provides support for listening for table changes and errors.
